data.question: What is the formula weight of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
What crystal system does Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH belong to?
What is the space group number for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
What temperature (K) were the intensity data for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH measured at?
What was the final R value after refinement for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
What type of radiation was used for measuring intensity data of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
How many unique reflections were measured for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
What was the method used for data collection of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
Was anisotropic thermal parameter applied to all non-hydrogen atoms for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH?
data.answer: Yes, except those of the disordered solvent structure.

data.question: Did the crystal of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH show significant decay during measurement?
data.answer: No significant crystal decay was observed.

data.question: Was the structure of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH solved using Patterson interpretation routines?
Is the crystal system of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH orthorhombic?
The space group for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH is P2/c.
The final Rw value for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH was below 0.07.
Absorption corrections were not applied for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH.
The crystal of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH belongs to the monoclinic crystal system.
The structure refinement for Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH was performed using SHELX-97.
The crystal dimensions of Zn(CN)(NO3)(tpt)2/3.3/4C2H2Cl4.3/4CH3OH were measured in millimeters.
